nodes.text: The Mandalorian: Season 1: Volume 1 is a title in Random House's Screen Comix line. It adapts episodes of the first season of The Mandalorian and was published on March 30, 2021.
Star Wars: The Mandalorian Screen Comix is a graphic novel-style retelling with full-color images and dialogue from the show!

The adventures of the Mandalorian, a lone gunfighter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, are now retold in the new Screen Comix format! The mysterious Mandalorian walks a thin line between right and wrong far from the authority of the New Republic in the epic addition to the Star Wars universe, available now on Disney+. Star Wars: The Mandalorian Screen Comix is a 320-paged graphic novel-style retelling of the first four episodes of the first season, featuring final frames and dialogue from the series in vibrant full color, will delight fans of all ages.
